articleText.data: Class: Magnoliopsida, Order: Rosales, Family: Rosaceae, Subfamily: Maloideae, Genus: Malus.
Class: Magnoliopsida, Order: Sapindales, Family: Rutaceae, Genus: Citrus.
Class: Magnoliopsida, Order: Rosales, Family: Rosaceae, Subfamily: Rosoideae, Genus: Rubus.
Vitamin A is needed for the immune system, vision, and many organs.
Vitamin C is needed for bones, cartilage, blood vessels, and neurotransmission.
Fiber is needed for digestion and cardiovascular health.
